moves.1. d4 Nf6 2. c4 e6 3. Nc3 Bb4: Nimzo Indian Defence, one of my favorite openings.
moves.11. Bxd7: ? A mistake on my part I didn't see Qxc3+

moves.12... Nxd7: he takes and is up a pawn
moves.13. Rc1: ? attacking his queen another mistake, giving up the pawn
moves.14. Kf1: Hiding so I din't get anymore checks and opening up the queen for the trap
moves.15... h6: Perfect he falls into the trap
moves.16. Bxh6 gxh6 17. Nf5: threatening his pawn and mate in 2
moves.18... Qc6: I think the only move to stop mate but I win a queen

moves.30. Ke1: He resigns. Thank you for watching please comment.
